General.Name: Hitechpros
General.Description: HITECHPROS Société anonyme provides subscription and staffing services in France. The company operates Hitechpros.com, that connects players in the IT sector. It also provides staffing service that enables information systems directors to find intellectual resources for their IT service needs. In addition, the company offers offers SHORTLISTMANAGER.com, a software package for optimizing purchases of intellectual services used by IT Departments and HITECHPROS.biz, a site for the sale/merger/acquisition of companies in the sector. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Montrouge, France. HITECHPROS Société anonyme is a subsidiary of Phenicie.
General.Address: 15-17, Boulevard du GEnEral de Gaulle, Montrouge, France, 92120
